name: Clarus Financial Technology
goal: ClarusFT provide data and analytics for derivative markets.  Clarusâ€™ tools create a window into the transparency data now available in swap data repositories and trading venues to help clarify and unify the vast, diverse information produced from the post-crisis regulatory changes. euInitiatives: MiFID II/MiFIR review report on the development in prices for pre- and post-trade data
